ygData.msgSnippet: agreed, I meant that the mob or critter if you prefer should be banned if anyone, not that we should all be banned, sorry if that was unclear.  When they root
ygData.messageBody:
agreed, I meant that the mob or critter if you prefer should be banned if
anyone, not that we should all be banned, sorry if that was unclear. When
they root me they force me to take advantage of an exploit if I am already
playing accelerando at the time, because if its a bug when it breaks me free
if it pulses I exploit if I keep singing and if its a bug that it break the
Root when the song stops I exploit if I do not keep singing. Nothing I can
do reasonably will prevent accelerando from breaking the Root at the point
they cast it on me if I am already singing. If its an exploit, its one I
cannot avoid at the point except to just stand there when it gets broken.
That I think would be unreasonable. Not that that puts it out of Verant's
venue by any means.

Early trip home due to snow in 8 minutes here in Denver, woohoo!

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: M Sanford (Maev) [mailto:pr0teus@...]
Sent: Friday, December 03, 1999 7:39 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Un-Broken Song


From: "M Sanford (Maev)" <pr0teus@...>

Ok, well if Verant did truly intend Selo's to break root, they sure did
a sloppy job with it.
When you cure a disease, or dispel a buff, etc the appropriate icon and
effect is taken off to indicate this effect has been cancelled. Not so
with Selo's breaking root, so it would appear to be buggy. And as for
sitting there being rooted after you zone, thats just ridiculous.
Either A) Verant is quite sloppy with their intentions for Selo's to
break root, or B) Its just a bug.
Choice A wouldn't surprise me at all.. I mean this is Verant afterall.
But I'm inclined to believe choice B.
Now technically if its marked as a bug and you use it.. this is
exploiting. But as if Verant would care. So don't be a jerk and say
stuff like "oh we should all be banned!"
Anyways.. think my point is that the way its currently designed now, it
cannot be ruled out as a bug.

Maev Lorekeeper
